name: SUPER KINKY
detailed_description:
THE JIM STERLING TRAILER REVIEW FROM 2016

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dqYkVdi-3Tc

THE RISE OF A HERO:

Once there was an ordinary young woman (a very horny, ordinary young woman) to whom something extraordinary happened. One night during a heated threesome a bizarre accident occurred transforming her into SUPER KINKY, defender of mankind's naughty pleasures.

EPISODE ONE - BALLS DEEP IN THE DEAD:

Now the succubus LILITH has stolen all of Earth's sex toys and taken them to the lusty second circle of Hell as gifts for her minions. Only one hero is kinky enough to penetrate the devil's back door and beat off evil to retrieve them. It's up to SUPER KINKY to restore naughty pleasure to humanity.

THREE UNIQUE ARENAS:

Master three challenging arenas and do battle with enemies ranging from demonic gimps and bone-wielding skeletons to life-leeching vampires and fireball-throwing demons.


SUCKFEST - A lair of female vampires hunger to suck you dry.
BAREBONED - Hard bone pounds soft flesh in this skeleton-filled dungeon.
HOT AND HORNY - Flaming demons unload their fiery balls all over an ancient foundry.

KEY FEATURES:



  • High-speed, old-school FPS action
  • Environmental hazards and deadly traps
  • Over-the-top character customization
  • Dozens of sex toys to boost your score
  • No loot boxes, only loot for your box
  • In-game high score tracking and objective system
  • Destructible props and random item drops from enemies
  • Gallery of 50 naughty magazines to collect
  • Mature humor

WARNING!:

This game is designed for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all players as it contains the following:


  • BLOOD AND GORE
  • INTENSE VIOLENCE
  • STRONG LANGUAGE
  • STRONG SEXUAL CONTENT
  • DISTURBING IMAGERY
  • SATANIC SYMBOLISM
  • NUDITY

short_description: SUPER KINKY is a violent goregasm of brutal, bloody, balls-to-the-wall action. Dominate endless hordes of Hellspawn with high-powered, lightning-fast gunplay. Master three unique arenas, dodge deadly traps, set high scores, find collectables, and give evil the spanking it deserves!
reviews:
“SUPER KINKY is so FANTOXIC, you'd think it was made by the Troma Team!”
Lloyd Kaufman, Pres. Troma Entertainment and creator of the Toxic Avenger

“This story's amazing, it's better than Heavy Rain.”
Jim Sterling

“SUPER KINKY is an FPS kinky enough to give SJWs an aneurysm.”
One Angry Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 970 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
